column.name: DWH_SOURCE_IND
column.comment: Indicator from which system the data record comes (2: Debit, 3: Credit).

column.name: MARKET_CODE
column.comment: Market to which the customer is assigned. Examples are MMC (credit customers who have a contract with VfD2), PUC (credit customers who have a contract with a partner company), MMO (prepaid customers who are directly assigned to VfD2), PUA (prepdaid customers who have a partner company) ), XMK (Cross Market).

column.name: SK_NUM
column.comment: The Skeleton contract number identifies the Skeleton contract in the system. The Skeleton contract number contains the following:   First digit represents the Subsidiary.   Second digit represents the Class.   Four remaining digits are user defined.

column.name: EFFECTIVE_DATE
column.comment: Start date of the validity period (yyyymmdd)

column.name: SYS_CREATION_DATE
column.comment: Date of creation of the data record in the operative system

column.name: SYS_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: Date of modification of the data record in the operative system

column.name: OPERATOR_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the last user

column.name: APPLICATION_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the application that last processed the sentence

column.name: SK_STATUS
column.comment: Skeleton status   D - Draft   F - Finalised   N - Discontinued

column.name: EXPIRATION_DATE
column.comment: End date of the validity period in the format YYYYMMDD. As long as the data record is valid in its current constellation, the date is on December 31, 3500.

column.name: SALE_EFF_DATE
column.comment: This field defines the date from which the item is available for sale.

column.name: SALE_EXP_DATE
column.comment: This field defines the date from which the item is no longer available for sale.

column.name: DRAFT_EFF_DATE
column.comment: The creation date of the Skeleton contract. A non editable field for informational purposes only.

column.name: FINALIZED_EFF_DATE
column.comment: The date the Skeleton contract was changed to Finalised. A non editable field for informational purposes only.

column.name: DISCONTINUED_EFF_DT
column.comment: The date the SK contract was changed to Discontinued. A non editable field for informational purposes only.

column.name: SIGN_OFF_DATE
column.comment: Skeleton Contract sign-off date

column.name: NUM_OF_COMPANIES
column.comment: Number of companies participating in the Skeleton Contract.

column.name: MAIN_COMPANY_NUM
column.comment: A reference to the main company of the Skeleton Contract (for a quick retrieve of the main company from the Company entity).

column.name: POTENTIAL
column.comment: will be maintained (A. Breeden)

column.name: SALES_FORCE_ID
column.comment: External sales organization ID

column.name: CLASS_NUM
column.comment: A number from 0 to 9, representing the type of organisation for which a Skeleton Contract is built.

column.name: SUBSIDIARY_CD
column.comment: The code of the cellular company subsidiary to which this subscriber is related .

column.name: EQ_PRICE_CD
column.comment: This code represents a list of equipment and prices that are eligible for SK customers under certain circumstances.

column.name: EQ_CATEGORIES_CD
column.comment: This code represents a list of equipment categories and subcategories, with their corresponding discounts or flat rates.

column.name: EQ_VENDOR_CD
column.comment: This code represents a list of discounts at the vendor level. These are eligible for SK customers under certain circumstances.

column.name: REMARKS
column.comment: Free text for remarks.

column.name: COND_REMARKS
column.comment: A free text for describing the BAN hierarchy and related Discounts. This field is presented in the Conditions window.

column.name: DISCRIPTION
column.comment: ACTUALLY NOT IN DWH

column.name: CONTRACT_TYPE
column.comment: ACTUALLY NOT IN DWH
